author: potuz
content: <@486501030046203915> I'd like your input on the following. On ePBS we can easily make the auction blind, what is the literature around this? what would be better for Ethereum?  I believe timing games are not avoided as better bundles do appear later, but at least blind auctions typically prevent a bid war in the last second so you get to have better valuation earlier in the slot.
